name: Tracy Shepard
text: Great prices, wonderful service!

name: james hamsting
text: Very positive experience with this company. the staff is very professional and experienced. I will definitely use this company in the future for used forklift trucks for sale. I love this company. Thank you so much.

name: jolly hanrics
text: One of the best forklift parts company. wonderful experience. Southern Lift Trucks is a great company to deal with. I highly recommend them for all of your forklift needs.

name: Porter Grey
text: very pleasant experience with Southern Lift Trucks. This is one of the best forklift truck rental company . They are knowledgeable, professional and patient. I highly recommend them to anyone.

name: jack sting
text: I used Southern Lift Trucks company forklift truck rental service . They have very nice service . They are knowledgeable, professional and patient. I highly recommend them to anyone.

name: Shania Shelby
text: Didn’t take a super long time. Was in and out in about 3 hours. Made the experience really fun and inclusive. Approved me for the wrong car but I love the car any ways and they have a beautiful selection of cars to choose from. Simply a decent car buying experience from a lovely team

resp.text: Thank you for your five-star review, Shania. Our team at Jim Burke Hyundai always strives for the highest standards. We are delighted we made your experience a positive one. Until next time, take care.

name: Stephanie Sloan
text: I assume everything was done correctly, oil change and tire rotation. I arrived at 3:06 for my 3:00 appointment. ( I did say I would be there by 3:15 when I scheduled). It was 5:04 when I left. That was a long time to service my vehicle, especially when having an appointment.

name: Jack Norris
text:
This was honestly the best experience I have had with a dealership.
First, like most dealerships you get a warm greeting and all the pleasantries of being a potential buyer. This is where my experience usually changes. Usually after the salesperson talks to me, and I tell them my wants then start the negotiations it all changes. This did not happen at all. The sales people Adrienne and Chris were friendly and helpful. They seemed to genuinely care. The financial personal Timberley was very warm and tried to relate to my country roots. There was another lady there that helped me and got the car I wanted and worked out the financial part. I unfortunately forgot her name. She was awesome as well and got me exactly what I wanted!

Thank you all and please keep up the great work!

name: Erica Bass
text: Wonderful love the sale man. He was very helpful. Nathan Merchant a around applause to you, And thank you for help my family in these difficult times.

name: Chandra Sekar
text: Do not recommend this place. The wait time is much longer than what was communicated initially and there isn't a proper documentation of the services performed. I  was charged for a tire rotation and this wasn't check marked on the completed services sheet. The response from the service staff was "the technician has done it but doesn't know why it's not check marked as completed". Doesn't provide me confidence to believe if any of the other services was even done.

resp.text: Hi Chandra, Thank you for taking the time to voice your concerns. Please reach out to us at (205) 324-3371 to further discuss your concerns. Thank you and we hope to hear from you promptly.

name: carole strong
text: Typically I get good service from Jim Burke but not this time. They made promises they didn’t keep and the service took much longer than they initially told me. Was without a car for two days. Said they would have the part overnighted however it didn’t show up until the second day.

name: Micah Shields
text: Great service! Brian was helpful with getting my car’s routine maintenance back on track and making sure that everything in my car was functioning properly.

name: Gary Schneider
text:
Wonderful personalized service received on Saturday, May 29th.
Broke down on highway on Friday night. Spoke with A J Allen in the service department and was told if I got the car there early on Saturday they would do everything possible to get me back on the road to Texas. A J was there on Saturday morning and was able to diagnose and fix the issue. He kept me updated throughout the morning and had me back up and running by 11:00.

name: Christelle Williams
text: Thanks to the People At Jimburke and Most definitely a HUGE THANKS TO The Hyundai Manager and Team For helping me Get in my First car ❤️ You should definitely stop here before losing hope, They help any situation.

resp.text: Hi Christelle, Thanks so much for taking the time to share your feedback! We're happy to hear that you had a great experience with us at Jim Burke Hyundai and hope to see you again take care!

name: Renee Page-Nash
text:
The service staff are excellent.  I am disappointed with the suggested maintenance packages which are exorbitant.  They should just stick with the  owners manual maintenance schedule.

6/22 No one can tell me why my car is burning oil or why the oil light didn't come on when the oil was low.  This is concerning.

resp.text:
Renee,
Thank you so much for your review of Jim Burke Hyundai! We truly appreciate the feedback and hope to hear from you again.

name: Carey Culpepper
text: Very couteous and were willing to haggle.The new car clean-up dept needs a higher standard.

resp.text: Hi Carey, Thanks for sharing your experience. We hope you stop by and see us again soon.

name: Handsome K
text: It's located at the center of Birmingham city, where easy to access. They understand what the problem of your car and what to do to improve the condition regular basis. Their service reservation website is convenient keeping record.

resp.text: Hey there, thanks for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again at Jim Burke Hyundai.

name: Michelle Patterson
text: They listen and I just love their service

name: Sharon Burtnett
text:
My Husband and I bought our first Hyundai (Sonata) at Jim Burke in 2010. We are still enjoying this car and the sales experience was GREAT and we recommended them to friends and family.

In 2017 we bought a new Accent. Again everything was Great and we shared this experience as well.We returned  in 2018 ams bought an Elantra. The Elantra recently broke
down.  Out of warranty of course. We had it towed to Jim Burke  and we received a call that my car needed  an engine. The cost of $7500.00.I thought since we bought 3 new cars that maybe we could get a deal on this service.INSTEAD we were told there was a $150.00 for checking the car out. This was not diacussed when we called and dropped the car off. Nothing like being kicked while you are down. I did some research and found there have been problems with the Engines in the ElantrI am verys sossapointes with the company I thought was so HRgreat and can no longer recxpmend the company and I will also tell anyone that will losten about thisbjorrivlw expeI qill tell anyone who qill liisten about this horrible experience!

My typing is not so grear because of broken hand and arm.

resp.text: While we are thankful for your feedback, we would like to learn more about why your experience was not an exceptional one. Reach out to us at (205) 324-3371 to let us know how we can improve for your next visit.

name: Tre Zimmerman
text: Go see Brandon Montgomery! He will get you right with what you need! Thank you sir!

resp.text: Hey there, Tre, thanks for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again at Jim Burke Hyundai.

name: Jasmine Densmore
text: I recently had to replace my windshield and I am so please with the service at Jim Burke. The technician did excellent work and also changed my oil without me even asking. The service at this location is always great and I'll remain a loyal customer.

resp.text: Hello Jasmine and thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you have nothing but amazing things to say about our team at Jim Burke Hyundai and what we offer.

name: Robert Cato
text: great friendly service!! Jordan smith and Toni vines both worked with me through 3 visits. They both took time and patience working with me and getting me the best deal for what I had to offer.. I highly recommend both of these salesmen if you go to Jim Burke used car lot in north Birmingham. I was also checked up on and greeted by several other employees through out the visits. Overall great experience!!

name: Mary Ricks
text: Erica Holmes and Tanya Shelby made my experience at Jim Burke Hyundai best ever in my life. This was my first new car and my experience was overwhelme by the love and kindness and hard work that Shelby and Holmes put in to make it happen.

resp.text: Mary, Thank you so much for your review of Jim Burke Hyundai! We truly appreciate the feedback and hope to hear from you again.

name: Kleindienst Adams
text: Erica Holmes and the entire Jim Burke car purchasing experience was outstanding.  I will definitely be back

resp.text: Hey Kleindienst, thanks for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again at Jim Burke Hyundai.

name: Janita Armstrong
text: Always get things in writing with Jim Burke..turnover rate is ridiculous. You never know who you are speaking with. Sales person and manager who made "Promises of detailing my vehicle when purchased and reimbursement to the hyundai customer who recommended me, were all lies..when I called to follow up there were no longer there. The new manager had no clue and lied to me as well. I called to follow up..he was no longer there. Poor service, inaccurate quotes, and nothing but lip service given (telling me what they thought I needed to hear).

resp.text: Thank you, Janita, for taking the time to voice your concerns. Please reach out to us at (877) 796-4559 to further discuss your concerns. Thank you and we hope to hear from you promptly.

name: Hilda Henderson
text: Our experience with Jim Burke Hyundai was a very positive and pleasant one. Our sales representative, Larry Greenhill, went above and beyond to make sure we were satisfied with our purchase. His efforts were not in vain. I am very pleased with my 2020 Tucson Sport.

name: Frankie Washington
text: The whole team was wonderful but special mention for my salesman Antonio Gillespie and the Finance manager Melvin. Speedy and professional service with a smile and no games. Everyone was so friendly!! Got a wonderful deal and reasonable monthly payments!!! I recommend them highly!!!

name: Sandy Stern
text: Time expected to be finished was what they told me. Unfortunately,they could not complete all the repairs today. I really think that they needed to wait until they could repair all things at the same time.

name: PATRICK HASSELL
text: Good people GREAT product!

resp.text:
Patrick,
Thank you for reviewing your service experience! We aim to provide time-efficient and exceptional service for our guests, and we are proud that this was received during your time spent with us.

name: Essie Johnson
text: I can honestly say my experience was great! My salesman, Dennis Johnson was absolutely AMAZING! He is very knowledgeable, courteous,  attentive, patient, honest. If you are looking for a car without all the hassle, Jim Burke Hyundai is where you want go. The staff is great.  Great deals, great cars, great people!  They really care!  I am a customer for life!

name: Alexus Carter
text: I had a great experience at this dealership, everyone was really friendly and willing to help. The best thing was I drove away in a new car! Big thanks to everyone who helped! I definitely recommend!

name: Paul Berman
text: Jordan Cook continuously goes out of his way to ensure that my service visits are done quickly, in the most cost efficient manner.   Servicing my car can be a challenge as I am currently traveling outside of AL weeks at a time.  Whenever its time for the vehicle's next servicing, help is only a p[hone call away.  Jordan demonstrates unwavering attention to details and customer service, which is why I bring my 2016 Hyundai Sonata Sport to Jordan in Birmingham versus having it serviced in Atlanta or other possible locations.  Why?  Because in my opinion, he cares about his customers and their satisfaction with Jim Burke's service and his own professional service as well.  Thank you Jordan for all you do!

name: Angela Brown
text: I purchased a new Sonata and everyone at Jim Burke was so helpful & nice. My salesperson Alexis was so knowledgeably and was not pushy at all. The General Manager Tanya worked really hard on getting me approved for the vehicle and was very detailed and explained everything to me and kept me informed through the whole process

name: josette rice
text: Always outstanding service!  Jordan and everyone on the service  team is always very helpful and believe in making sure you're a satisfied customer!

resp.text: Thank you, Josette for this wonderful review of Jim Burke Hyundai. Jordan and the rest of our fantastic team here pride themselves on making every visit with an exceptional one. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Have a nice day!

name: Melissa Mynatt
text: The service center was excellent. From the time i got there until I had left the customer service was one of the best i had visited to date.  The only complaint i had was grease was left on my driver seat and on the driver door liner.  I wished the mechanic had paid as much attention as the service center or possibly protected the seat.

name: Bryanna McClain
text: The associates at Jim Burke Hyundai all were welcoming and kind. In particular I would like to acknowledge my dealer Andrew Briggins who made sure I was comfortable and that I got what I wanted. He was very thorough and very knowledgeable about the inventory at hand and unknowingly persuasive when introducing me to the 2020 Hyundai Sonata SEL. I absolutely love my car and I am proud of my choice. Thank you Andrew and Jim Burke Hyundai for my sweet sweet ride!

name: Susan Crow
text: I have had a great experience with Eddie Hicks as my service advisor.  I always feel like I am being dealt with honestly.

resp.text: Susan, we are glad to hear you had a positive experience working with Eddie.  Our team prides themself on providing an honest and easy approach to helping our customers with all of their automotive needs.

name: Bama Born & Bred
text: I went to Jim Burke Hyundai recently and received excellent service. The service technician was very nice and polite. He advised me of a recall that was on my car and explained what it was for and how they would fix it.  I got three services for my car(which included the recall) and was out in 1 hour. I didn’t even have an appointment!!! The customer waiting area was comfortable and check out was easy and quick.  I would highly recommend the service department to anyone needing great work on their automobile and good customer service.

name: Jon Tanja
text: I was satisfied

name: Ayesha Aj
text: Jessie was the best car salesman I have ever encountered. Adrienne was not my salesperson but she was very hospitable, friendly and thorough! I would definitely recommend either of them to anyone needing a vehicle !!

name: Tae Alexander
text: Purchased a 2020 Hyundai Santa Fe’ through Brandon Blagg. He was excellent from the beginning to the end. He made the process easy. He explained and demonstrated things to us in a way that most others might have not. Although the sale was important, to him he showed just as much concern about driving away in something that we wouldn’t regret. The atmosphere was nice and welcoming. Not boring at all. The staff was friendly too.  In the end Brandon wouldn’t stop until the last tire received its shine. Thanks a bunch!

name: Monica Leach
text: I am enjoying my little gas saver.

resp.text: Monica, we hope we can turn these 3 stars into 5. We want to hear from you—please give us a call when you can at (877) 796-4559. Thanks!

name: Brittany Card
text: Took my car in for a check engine light that was on for a month. The light was off by the time I took it in of course but Jim Burke found the problem and fixed it. Location is so close and convenient to my job so made it easy to drop off and pick up. Will definitely be going to them again for any service for my car! They were fantastic!

name: Dayatra Laster
text: Service writer recommended I get a transmission flush on 2/17/20. I had a transmission flush done on 1/27/20. Same auto shop same service writer.

name: Jillian Carter
text: I had a really awesome experience at Jim Burke Hyundai. I was referred by a close friend of the family to go in visit Alexis and Tanya. These ladies lets my family and I  know that they had our best interest at heart.The service was quick and smooth. I truly thank Jim Burke and staff for our 2019 Elantra Value.

name: Alexis Morton
text:
I had a very wonderful experience at the  Hyundai service department.  Eddie Hicks, the service representative was very knowledgeable and helpful during my visit. Questions were answered without hesitation and he didn’t try to rush me off. Eddie was also helpful getting me an Uber to my friends house . After getting to my friends house and getting a bite to eat my car was ready to be picked up. Fast service. Thanks again for taking care of my car. I will be back for an oil change in a few months.
Alexis Morton

name: Beth Cooper
text: The staff were wonderful and extremely professional.  They updated me when needed, took time to explain the automotive issue and the repair used to update the vehicle. Another impressive detail I noted was the multiple transporters who checked to see if the customers had a need for transportation.  I’ve been highly impressed by the service provided and I will definitely return .

name: LUIS FELIPE ORTIZ ALMODOVAR
text: My experience from the start was very respectful treatment from all the team at Jim Burke specially from Clearance thanks to all you guys and for the cups of coffee during the deal thanks to be so kind with me even when my English it was not perfect you deal with and gave me a good attention to all my request God Bless You All Guys and thank you Kendra for your help and beautiful Smile all the time

name: Andrew Gordineer
text: Even though I didn't get my car there, they were very accommodating.

resp.text: Andrew, We're grateful to know that your experience with us was an amazing one! We look forward to seeing you again soon at Jim Burke Hyundai.

name: Holly Davis
text: Completely satisfied!  I would 100% buy another car from Jim Burke.  Their selection is great and the Sales and Finance teams were excellent to work with.  They were understanding and able to work with our situation and got us exactly what we wanted.

name: Berdell White
text: I was very pleased with the service that I received from everyone at Jim Burke's All my questions were answered promptly!  I'm enjoying my new 2020 Hyundai Palisade! I love it!

name: Peter Newman
text: Good workmanship but the place is rather crowded and hectic.  They need more space and the ability to put fine touches like cleaning to a job after completion considering the quotes are a bit pricey.

name: Sandra D Kindell
text:
The service associates are always professional and courteous.  They advise on service needed to your car, giving details of the service and the expected cost. The cost factor is important, because  quite frankly, money doesn't grow on trees.  They  also give you an estimation on the length of time involved in completing the setvice.  Most of them remember you if you have had repeat business with Jim Burke.

The cashier at the Hyundai service area is always very friendly and helpful.  She is an asset to the department.

name: mycal garrett
text: I just purchased a car from Hyundai and i had the best experience I've had in a long time. My sales rep was Ashley and she is a very polite and respectful salesman. She helped me with everything that i needed and then some. Very knowledgeable about the product and very informative as well. Probably one of the best sales reps I've had the pleasure of dealing with. If you are interested in buying a Hyundai from Jim Burke. Ask for Ashley she wont disappoint.

name: Sherry Lacey
text: Chris Thomas and the finance manager were great! I know God sent them to me. They are the best! Thank you!

name: Steven Gross
text: My experience with Jim Burke Body Shop was a pleasant one - from the initial phone call, through the claim/repair process, and finally to pick-up. At the front desk, Ashley handled my reception with the utmost courtesy and customer service. Josh, the assistant manager was equally professional and the one who handled my claim and kept me up to date on the status and dealt with the insurance company on my behalf. Finally, on pick-up, I found my car waiting for me, freshly cleaned - inside and out. The body shop is a Hyundai preferred repair center and I would recommend them to my fellow Hyundai drivers.

name: Myra Reed
text: I was thrilled with the short wait time. I always ask for Eddie and once again he provided superior customer service. As an example, it was raining and he pulled my car inside so I wouldn’t get wet when leaving. Super great guy!!

name: Bobbie Cagle
text: Always quick and on time.  Always friendly and helpful!

text: Jim Burke Hyundai is a great place to get a car Tony take his n da rest of the team to I love I would have them ten stars

Eddie Hicks is very nice and very up to date on the details of our Hyundai. Has been very helpful during recalls.
Also pleasant and friendly when car needs serviced.

text: Had a really good experience.  My sales rep Brian Christopher was very helpful without being pushy.  He listened to what I wanted and did everything to make sure I was satisfied. By the time I left I thought of him as a friend and not just a sales rep.  I was very impressed with the lease experience.  Had never done this before but it was not at all scary or stressful.  I have always had a high opinion of the dealership and this has confirmed my opinion.  Love the car and expect to be doing business with this rep and dealership for a long time.

I knew I wanted a Hyundai dealer to replace the tire.We found a gas station, then found this dealer right around the corner! The service department was incredibly nice and squeezed us into their busy day.  We were back on the road in no time! Thankyou, Thankyou, Thankyou, Jim Burke Hyundai! I love my local Hyundai dealer (shout out to Hyundai of Metairie!) but this one is fabulous too!!!

name: Tebriel Alexander
text:
I went to test drive a Hyundai Santa Fe'  two days ago. This is not my first Hyundai since reinventing itself and blowing our minds. Needless to say I purchased what is now my 5th Hyundai.  However, i'm here to brag on the man who walked my husband and I through this entire process in this humid Alabama weather.  Initially, I came in to take advantage of the $50 GIFT CARD that Hyundai was offering for simply test driving its vehicles, but I also knew that I would potentially be driving off the lot with something new as well. Brandon Blagg was awesome from the gate. He stood and walked over to me, invited me to his desk, and inquired concerning my business. A few questions later, a copy of my license, and "BAM" we were test driving a base model Santa Fe.' One would think that this guy designed these vehicle with his level of knowledge concerning them. Recalling that I have own several vehicles in my lifetime, it is feasible to understand that we have dealt with our share of sales consultants. This is by far the first person who not only informed us of what we would potentially enjoy about the vehicle, but patiently explained in detail its benefits, and demonstrated  to us its functionality. He took a base model vehicle and literally painted a picture that lifted it beyond it's level. He hung out with us for over an hour doing comparisons and contrasts. He was honest concerning pro and cons, but never negative.. not one time. For him every vehicle had its benefits, and for every person there was vehicle that fit them. THIS IS WHAT HE DID! He didn't interfere with our choice, but he made sure that we would be satisfied once we left  the lot for good. In the end we ended up purchasing a Santa Fe' SEL 2.4 engine with both the Convenience and Premium Package. He didn't use a hustler tactic to cause us to go for a higher grade, it was simply his transparency and patience that ultimately led to our selection. Recalling that this was in 90 + degree weather, this man didn't stop until the tires shined.  He made me laugh, shared stories, explained who was whom of the CEO vs. COO, and also wasn't shy around me whatsoever. He even blew bubble gum bubbles for our delightful 6 year old who stood amazed at the excellence his gum blowing abilities. Brandon Blagg, job well done. You deserve all that's coming for your hard work and dedication to service. Aside from our direct experience with Brandon, everyone rocked. Their pleasantness was superb, two of the women conversed with me, they offered treats to my babies, and others smiled and waved. There wasn't a rude attitude in the building. The lobby and bathrooms are well designed and clean. As lengthly a process that car buying could be, they have enough going for themselves to make you relax and enjoy your time.

Thanks Again, Tae A.

name: Agee Richardson
text: I can't say enough about the awesome staff in the Jim Burke Hyundai Service Department. Rusty, the Hyundai Service Department manager, has been very attentive to my automotive needs. When there was a way to hold the manufacturer's accountable for repairs associated with their recall, this service manager had no problem going to bat for me. Although my first impression of this establishment was not a good one due to lack of communication, my final impression is the one that REALLY COUNTS! I feel so blessed that these were the guys: Rusty, Eddie and Justin that tended to my 2013 Hyundai Sonata and me when my car just STOPPED RUNNING on the interstate. It took about a month to get my car fixed right, but they have stuck it out. I am proud to say that my blue-silver streak and I are on the road again tearing up the highway!!! Adrienne Richardson from Birmingham is your #1 Fan!!!

name: Keven Akings
text:
I've purchased several cars and this experience by far stands out as one of the worst.......from beginning to end. I test drove the vehicle on a Monday and pointed out a few cosmetic issues that I feel should have been addressed prior to placing the car up for sale (only a few hundred dollars to correct).  That combined with the manager coming outside to talk to me smoking a cigarette, should have clued me in to the professionalism and pride taken at the dealership.
I was asked that if the problems I pointed out were corrected,  would I purchase the car? I agreed.  The following day I recieved the bill of sale and I noticed that the price shown on the internet was not the price shown on the bill of sale. When I asked the manager, the explanation I recieved was that the car was headed to auction the day I saw it and the price on the internet was the auction price, not the sale price (what does that have to do with me? And the price I came intending to pay is the price that I saw advertised ).  I was then told that they would sell it to me at the internet price but I would have to pay for the repairs which would be $400+.  Since the price was still under book value,  I agreed.  I was then told that the car would be repaired, HAND WAXED and ready for me in a couple days.  I was informed Friday that the car was ready. I drove up Saturday only to find the car just as dirty as it was when I test drove it on Monday(they sprayed the dirt off but there was still hair and dirt on the inside of the car.... wheel wells were dirty, etc). Of all the cars I've bought,  no one has ever tried to delivered me a dirty car! I discussed this with the manager who appeared to care nothing about it.  I left with no intention of buying the car,  but the salesman,
Mr. Willie, called and said that he would take care of it...... he took it to a local shop and had it washed and vacuumed.  As a customer, when money is spent, whether it be $30 or $30,000, you want to feel good about spending it. That's not the feeling I left with.  In the end, I purchased what I feel is a great vehicle.   But the service is what will definitely keep me from being a repeat customer or recommending to anyone else.  Professionalism and putting the customer first is definitely lacking and needs a lot of improvement.

name: Jo Jones
text: I am completely dissatisfied with Jim Burke Suburu and will not ever bring my car there again, even if I have to drive outside Alabama. I took the car in for four recalls.  When I picked up the car the car three lights came on, the car wasn't running smoothly, and I called the technician. He said "nothing they did could have caused this."  Also he told me the diagnostic test -which I didn't want or ask for - indicated the car needed a timing belt,AC etc lot of work that's is needed at a 100,000 miles.  I told him this was already done.  I took my car to my usual mechanic who cleaned the throttle so that the new ECM would read it properly.  Your guys should have known this and should not have returned the car to me in the condition they did.  Also,the right passenger airbag light hasn't been reset.  It's still showing an error. I just hope they really replaced the defective airbag

Ok so I paid for the work myself. text:
I was treated very politely, the salesman even picked me up at my home, because my car had caught on fire and I had nothing to drive.BUT the car I was supposed to look at was no longer available. They did not tell me it had sold when I called that same morning to verify my appt. & it's still on the internet as "Available" the following day. Further more 5 days later, it's still listed on the internet as available. So NOW I'm positive it's to lure customers in. If someone is awaiting approval for financing on this vehicle, the very least Jim Burke Hyundai should do is post a flag on the car saying; "Sold Pending Approval of Financing". In my opinion, that would be " Professional Business Protocol".

I'm of the opinion that they might possibly do this to get customers to come in when it looks like a certified car is lower priced then average.

I believe they tried to do a "bait & switch" maneuver on me by showing me a same priced vehicle that was the same color but a different make and model.

The sales mgr. also told me he would find me a Pre-certified car in the same price range that same day, however he never followed through or even had the professionalism to call me back one way or the other. I called him later that afternoon, I didn't want the other car I looked at, at another dealership to get sold, & asked if he could call me back by 6pm  to tell me if he had found another car so I could make a decision. He never called.

Bottom line... before you make the trip to see a specific car, make absolutely sure it's still for sale.

name: Traci Miller
text: DO NOT PURCHASE A USED CAR FROM THIS DEALERSHIP. And if you do, please, make sure you ask them to print and show you any TSB's (Technical Service Bulletin) on the vehicle you are considering. A TSB is not like a safety recall and therefore the dealership is not required to make the repair. Make them prove to you that they have repaired all of the items on each and every TSB. However, I can almost promise you that they will not make the repairs before selling you the vehicle. I purchased a used 2007 Hyundai Entourage van from Jim Burke Hyundai's used car dealership in March this year after having purchased a new Elantra from them last year. I did not make them show me the TSB's because I wasn't aware of them at the time. Unfortunately there are several of them on the van I purchased. One of them had to do with a part that causes called the "Junction Box Switch" or Instrument Panel Module that causes the battery to discharge. That means when you go out to your car it simply won't start!! I found the TSB on it and it says in large print that it was issued to all Hyundai General Managers and that the repair should be made before retail sale of the van. Many of us believe that purchasing a used car from what you think is a reputable dealership will protect you from these type issues. Well...this dealership is not reputable and should be put out of business. I have contacted them to give them a change to try and make this right to keep customers happy and try to get return business but they obviously are not intersted in this. I will be taking further action regarding this issue.

text: I had/continue to have a great experience with them. Andre had me in and out of this place in under an hour with keys in hand. He was very friendly to not only me but also my daughter as well. these 4 and 5 star reviews have to be fake or paid for. have to be!
I got a car from them a little while back , charged almost 6000$ over what the car was worth and was assuming I was getting a decent  car. NOPE!
It’s completely undriveable,I spent every penny our family had in the bank and everything I could borrow and I’m still paying payments and it’s sitting in a shop till I can pay the rest of the bill.
They knew about the problems and lied to my face !
Stay far away

resp.text: Hi Jonathan, I am sorry to hear about your experience with A&M Auto Sales. I can assure you that management has changed since then. We are very different now and strive to provide the best service possible!

name: Robert Bates
text: Stay away! They are deceptive and cheats. I bought a truck from them at an outrageous price (had no options at the time and needed a truck A.S.A.P. for business) and I have spent over $5,000 fixing it in the 6 months I've owned it. I was told by Lee and the "salesman" that the truck was $11,000, only to charge me $13,000. Of course once I realized what they did and contacted them they play dumb and it is too late. I know if I should have taken more time to review and ask questions but it was the end of the day, past business hours already and I needed to leave with the truck that day. Regardless you should never practice those business ethics in any industry. I have had to change the rotors, brakes, brake drums, brake cylinder, master cylinder, calipers and brackets, hub assembly, CV axles, steering arm, I am in the process of changing the transfer case (over $2,000 on it's own) and it still needs a steering column, gear box, front differential, driveshaft and possibly the rear differential. When it's all said and done I will have put at least 5 times the value of this truck into making it run right and paying it off. I am a self employed remodeler and I have missed countless days of work, lost countless jobs and it's gotten to the point that I am having trouble paying for my daughters daycare and buying her essentials. This whole deal has radically ruined my life. These people knew the situation I was in and absolutely took full advantage. Beware!!!

resp.text: Hi Robert, I am so sorry to hear about the terrible experience you had with A&M Auto Sales. Our management has changed since then. We now have a great team behind us to help with any issues with the vehicles for future or current customers!

name: Katarina Essenmacher
text:
Never again. I came in to test drive a car they had that was the only one around that was similar to the one I wanted, with the intention of having them order what I wanted if I liked it. I was very clear about that from the beginning. The person we'd originally made our appointment with was too busy to meet with us, the two different salesmen we were bounced to spent a combined 20 minutes just looking for the car they had said they'd have pulled around when we got there.  They spent most of the time trying to convince me to settle for the one they had, which was the wrong color (not a huge deal) and a Limited where I was looking for an Ultimate and didn't have any of the specific features I'd picked the Ultimate for (a bigger deal). When they finally agreed that they could order the car I wanted, they tried to convince me to buy it faster, claiming that in the few weeks I was planning to wait until some new payoffs reported on my credit, qualifying me for a 0% interest rate, my trade would decline in value and that I didn't want a 0% interest rate anyway. They kept me another 20 minutes after I said I needed to leave for an appointment, and even had the sales manager come out asking us, "Why do you hate my car", to try to convince us to buy the wrong one again. They didn't even pretend to care if I got the car I wanted (even though I'd have been spending more money), they just wanted me to buy whatever they could push off on me right that second. Overall, a terrible experience, and I felt more like a hostage negotiating for my release than a customer.

After it was all said and done, I bought somewhere else, got exactly the car I wanted, in exactly the time frame I wanted. And despite the salesman's threats that my trade wouldn't be worth what I wanted to get for it if I waited a few weeks, I got $3000 more for it than I'd asked Tameron for.

name: Renae Patterson
text: Originally went to Tameron Hyundai looking for a used car.  We met Antoine Gray who was so helpful to us that when we decided to buy a brand new 2019 Hyundai Santa Fe Ultimate 2.0 we called upon him.  He is NOT pushy or aggressive which would have instantly turned us off. Instead he kept in touch either calling or texting us just checking in to see if there was anything we needed. He went out of his way to get us exactly the car we wanted.  When we picked up car both he and Christina did an excellent job of explaining all the features so we were comfortable driving it off the lot.  I had previously reached out to 6 different dealerships before deciding Tameron. Save yourself some time and just go to Tameron and ask for Antoine. I promise you will not be sorry.  (We got the  scarlet red one)

name: Laura Burke
text: Lawrence and David absolutely outdid themselves. They understood my circumstances and worked with me to get me back on the road. They spoke to me as a person, not just a quota to fill and stayed late in order to accommodate me. 10/10 wonderful service, definitely worth checking out, they'll treat you well. Thanks guys!

name: Kevin Wheatley
text: Excellent service. The service advisor Mitchell was professional from the moment I drove in. He greeted me and after I explained I was there for a recall/issue he went ahead and advised me of how long the service would take. He even checked the system to see if I had a plan to cover my oil change at my current mileage and advise me to come back within a certain mileage range. I didn’t even know my plan had these stipulations. I decided to wait for my car and it turned out that the recall service was even quicker than he advised it would be. I’ve been to other Hyundai service stations in AL and NJ and by far Mitchell and Tameron Hyundai are the best.

name: Danna Jones
text: Mitchell made my experience AWESOME.  He went above and beyond helping me find out about the warranty on my car and saved me several hundred dollars and I was able to go ahead and have my window fixed. THAT is good customer service!

name: John Muir
text: Thanks to the people at Tameron Hyundai for providing excellent service.  My service advisor Randall, helped me to get my Sonata up-to-date with all required services, and all services were completed in one day!  Tameron's shuttle service picked me up within 5 minutes of my arrival and drove me to work in a 2016 Honda Odyssey with leather.  I was glad the Service Department stayed open until 6 pm, allowing me to work my regular 8 to 5 workday before picking up my Sonata.

name: Brian Langlois
text: I had an appointment for regular maintenance and service. They informed me that there was a recall on my vehicle (computer update) and that they would take care of it at the same time as my service. They got me in and out quickly. They were courteous and efficient.

name: Donna Allen
text: They say you’ll love the way your treated. Well they may not be mean or hateful, but they sure don’t mind making you wait and not following through with what they say. I have called and left messages for both sales and service center with no return call. I found out that I could have gotten my same car elsewhere for thousands less and I thought they cared about their customers. Other than maintenance, that will take hours, I will not use Tameron Hyundai again.

name: Clif Render
text: Tameron Hyundai's service department is second to none. They are always prompt and thorough and are always careful not to overcharge or provide duplicate services. If I never have to use anyone but Tameron Hyundai again, I will be a happy individual!

name: Judy Van Luchene
text: This is the best dealership I have dealt with. I have dealt with Honda, Ford, and a few others over the years. This dealership was the easiest to work with and the negotiate with. Their service department is great. Nice place to wait if you prefer. Our salesman worked especially hard to get us what we wanted at the price we needed. And we love our Sante Fe more than any vehicle we have owned, and that's quite a few over our roughly 45 years of owning vehicles. I am a tough negotiator and they made it easy when I told them what I needed.

name: Jeff Martin
text:
5 stars for the sales team. One star for the service team. I have far too many complaints to list here, but the biggest is placing multiple requests to speak to a manager and not once getting through or receiving a returned call. I'm starting to think "Joe" doesn't even exist. Their tag line is "where you'll love the way you're treated" is too hilarious. While Citron is an amazing salesperson, I'll be taking my future business elsewhere.
Bottom line: they're all too eager to sell you a car and not a bit eager to service it.

name: Kenneth R. Huff
text: Tameron Hyundai ordered a Throttle Body(ETC Actuator), which was shipped overnight, for my Genesis sedan. I replaced the part myself which is working great! My car drives much better! I would like to say Thank You to the Parts Guy for ordering my ETC and the Service Crew for diagnosing my car!

name: Katherine Cottingham
text: Brian was my guide to a very nice experience in car maintenance.  The entire staff was very customer focus which is rare these days.  They are professional and efficient

name: Ken Blalock
text: The most efficient buying process I have experienced.  I live in Tuscaloosa County and I asked them to price a car to make me come to Birmingham and buy it.  They did.

name: David Stopak
text: We were very concerned when our Santa Fe engine started acting up. The service department it a great job to communicate with us and even provided us a loaner vehicle. Great job Tameron Hyundai.

name: Lisa Matherson
text: Citron was wonderful.  Very personable and easy to work with.  The only negative is the time it took to process the paperwork and prepare the car.  This could have been done in a couple of hours, but it took almost three.

name: Ryan Brand
text: My partner and I purchased 2 Genesis G70s in 2020 and have had nothing but problems with the cars. Door handles falling off, trim fading away, completely different color wheels on one vehicle, radio stopped working, air conditioner stops working, and the list goes on. The service department is far below exceptional as we were accused many times of being the cause of these problems. I live an hour away and was called to bring my car in for repair on many occasions only to arrive with the parts not even here, or parts here but they “weren’t allowed to put them on”. Our salesman, Mark, was the only one who seemed to care and got us help, but the rest of the place is terrible. We will never use this dealership again due to the total lack of responsibility from their service department and manager. Don’t worry about making appointments for service either as apparently they overbook appointments and a 30 minute oil change is turning into a 3 hour wait today.

name: Sherry English
text: Both our sales rep - Mr. Kelly & the Tameron Hyundai staff made our car buying purchase simple & easy. They "went above & beyond" to meet our needs.

name: FolaShade Thompkins
text: I had a simple request to have my new car tag mounted. They were so friendly and it took them no time to do it!

name: Emily Waldschmidt
text: Spoke with a gentleman about test driving the car of choice. I asked if he could come to me for the test drive. It seemed to be an issue for him to bring it to me because he would have been away from the dealership for two hours. I arranged my own time with them after work and had spoke with him prior to leaving my work . He was expecting me to be there by 4:30 and I was. When I got there I was informed they had just sold the car. I drove an hour and a half and wasted my time with these crooks. I would not recommend.

name: Dale Calvin
text: As Shady as Serra.  They agreed to numbers and had us drive in multiple times. but when it finally gets down to going to the finance office the numbers change and they will not meet their original commitment. We wasted so much time at this dealership and they are absolutely the shadiest dealership we've worked with in the Birmingham area. They're all about profit and not about their commitment. No integrity.  Feel free to text or email me for further details.

name: John Laurent
text: A service manager came to my car window as soon as I drove into the service bay.  He looked up my file, escorted me to a customer lounge area where there was water, coffee, and food.  He checked in with me after about 30 minutes to let me know how my service was progressing and came back a little later to escort me to my car.  He explained all paperwork.  It was a very painless experience.

name: Juanita Santana
text: Personnel were courteous and professional as always. Mike has assisted me on other occasions and I was always treated with respect, advised of any and all information required and he always tries to get me in and out of the facility as quickly as possible. Service and personnel has always and continues to be exceptional.

name: Kay Stephens
text:
We arrived about 10 minutes early. We were taken right in. Matt introduced himself and explained what he would be looking for n this recall. He even took the time to show my husband what he was looking for. We went to the showroom area to wait as waiting room was full. Matt sent a message to my phone telling me his name and number and to call if we had any questions. We badly waited 15 to 20 minutes before we were paged to tell us our Santa Fe was ready. A very pleasant experience.

That Genesis is some fine car. I won’t be able to afford it, but IF I did fall into a bucket of money...

name: Glennis Points
text: Tony Finley was the greatest!!!  Fast, thorough service and the staff was very attentive to customer needs.  Came looking for one specific vehicle on the lot. Got it!!!  Very happy!!

name: Beverly M
text: Matt in the service department was great! No bs, respectful, and professional. My engine had to be replaced. It took them about 3 days to get final warranty  approval from Hyundia and then 2 weeks to get the engine in and installed. They gave me a 2021 rental and the young lady that helped me with my rental was very nice and professional. Definitely a return customer.

name: Valerie Mcrand Horne
text: We had a great experience trading our vehicle for a new one. Tony did a great job getting the deal done.

name: Heather C
text:
Exceptional, Outstanding Customer Service at Tameron Hyundai buying a new Elantra with Kevin Dailey! I had an OUTSTANDING & EXCEPTIONALLY POSITIVE experience purchasing a brand new 2021 Hyundai Elantra SE at the Tameron Hyundai dealership.
First off, I received a call from Andrea in customer relations after I visited the website. She was SO friendly, pleasant, easy going and helpful!
She helped me set up a time to come in and look at the cars available.
When we got to the Hyundai dealership at noon, we met with Kevin Dailey.
My son and I felt so at ease with him. Kevin was AWESOME!!!
He was very friendly, respectful, attentive and knowledgeable.
He gave us a great introduction of the Hyundai Elantra SE we wanted. Despite the torrential downpour and flash food warning sirens and crazy scary lightning that day, we enjoyed the test drive with him.
The car drove like a dream through all that terrible weather. Kevin did a great job of working to get my monthly car payment rate at a price I felt comfortable with. He also guided me on how to coordinate with my AAA car insurance agent while waiting on financing dept, then he introduced us to Chayse. Chayse also did an exceptional job of getting all my financing paperwork together.He generously provided copies of documents I needed to get my new car’s tag and registration done at the DMV.
I had no real expectations that day other than to test drive a car.
My son and I researched a lot and compared the Toyota Corolla, Honda Civic and Hyundai Elantra SE. The excellent warranty, and better safety features, more cabin room, and other specs sold us on the Hyundai Elantra SE. Our prior vehicle broke down in February. It has been a tough 3 +months without the ability to go anywhere.
From start to finish we had an incredibly positive experience with everyone at Tameron Hyundai.
For us, it’s not just about a car. It’s about our freedom to get out and live life. We are TRULY GRATEFUL for our entire experience!
Kevin also scheduled our first maintenance appointment for November before we even drove off the lot!
We were thrilled to hear the warranty is doubled and our maintenance is will be handled at Tameron as well! AMAZING!!!
After driving in our last vehicle for 20 years, I’m SO GLAD we decided to trust our instincts and research about our new Gorgeous Hyundai Elantra and the Tameron Hyundai dealership! I posted Kevin’s business card on all my social media. This is THE BEST Mother’s day gift ever!
If you ever need to look for a new car I HIGHLY recommend Kevin Dailey and the entire team at Tameron Hyundai!

name: Stacey Daniel
text:
Hyundai manufactured vehicles during the years 2006-2016 that have given the owners terrible problems with paint. If this has happened to you, please research online and on different social media platforms. Hyundai needs to recall the vehicles affected, and repaint; or at the very least, repaint as customers report the damages incurred due to their faulty paint and/or procedure.
I will note that the staff was helpful and courteous at Tameron Hyundai. I sincerely hope that Hyundai National will act accordingly. My request has been made for them to address the paint issues with my vehicle.

name: Wes Allbritton
text: Check-in only took a couple of minutes, they were expecting me and had all the paperwork ready.  Timely service, resolved issue promptly!  My issue was covered under new car warranty!

name: Janelle Sanders
text: I’ve been coming to this location since 2018 and this was my first real professional experience. The service manager was extremely professional, helpful, and courteous. I have had maybe 2 other decent experiences at this location. This guy has been with the company for 20 years and I see why, he does a great job. I didn’t get his name but he was helpful. Thank you!

name: Blake Greene
text: Kevin was great! Worked with our budget and made the buying experience enjoyable.

name: Andrew Bond
text:
I recently visited for my first scheduled maintenance. The service department did not notify me that they had disabled my automatic lights. This cause me to have the unpleasant experience of being pulled over by the police. I am glad that they pulled me over though, because leaving the lights off with out telling me could have cause a serious wreck!!!

Since this post Hyundai reached out to me to address the issue with their team.  I am happy that this should not happen again to any other clients.

name: Joe Johnson
text: Well pleased  with Ed Cox your sales rep. His special attention in handling senior citizens. Good work Ed. Also really enjoyed dealing with your credit guy, sorry I could not recall his name. We are really enjoying the Santa Fe.

name: Courtney Garner
text: Great experience and very friendly staff! Answered all my questions and were prompt in resolving my car needs

name: Andrew Foreman
text: Brian was great! He let me know what was going to happen each step of the way. Also was very detailed in explaining what the issue was and how to address it.

name: Shannon Worley
text: Nice and polite..not pushy sales reps

name: Katie Hartsell
text: Kevin Daily did a phenomenal job explaining everything to us about the vehicle we were looking at and eventually purchased. He was very knowledgeable and took extra time with us in making sure we were comfortable and answered all questions. We will definitely see Kevin for our next purchase.

name: glen biles
text:
From my first online contact with Tameron Hyundai, I was very impressed by the friendly and professional attitudes of everyone there.
They really want to see you in a new Hyundai, and they work very hard to make it happen.
But they don't use pressure sales tactics to make it happen.
I love my new Hyundai Tucson, and I'm very happy that I chose Tameron Hyundai.

name: Jay Ismail
text:
First class service
Michael in the service department solve all my problems great people

name: Bill Krumrei
text: I was pleased with the salesman but ensure you get the warranty included in the price.  Otherwise you can expect to spend an additional $2K and won't find out about it until you go to finance the vehicle.  When the sales manager comes back with the price and says out the door!!! He or She is not including the warranty. You will be told this out the door price is only for the vehicle not the warranty.  When you email the sales manager for the store manager's email and phone you won't get a reply. Lease to say this will be the last time we buy a vehicle from Tameron.

name: Steve Noble
text: Had a great sales experience with Toney. Very professional.

name: Tonisha Gallimore
text: I absolutely LOVED the entire process with my salesman, Kevin! This was my first time buying a brand new car and he listened to my every word and found me a beautiful 2020 Sonata that fits in my budget and has all the automated features I wanted. I couldn't have asked for more!!!

name: Heath Moss
text: Mike Guthrie did a phenomenal job. I was not the easiest customer but he exceeded my expectations. Was upfront and honest through the process. Would highly recommend this salesman and dealership. Once the deal was ready I was in and out in 21 minutes. Great job

name: T B
text: Picked up my vehicle after being serviced to have grease all over my steering wheel and door handle.  Contacted them about it and was told an On Site manager would contact me and no one has. I have been to other Hyundai dealerships and have never received my vehicle back with grease on it.

name: Jo Herzog
text: I called day before when realized my daughter needed an oil change and maintenance visit . They got me in first thing next morning. In at 8 and out before we had a chance to get home and settle own. they also inspected car and let us know what we might need to be doing in near future

name: Mario Heacock
text:
Arrived at the dealership a little after 10:00. Appt had been scheduled, but we hadn't been given a name to ask for when we got there.
Our salesman greeted us as we were getting out of our old car and did ask if we were there to see anyone in particular.
Introductions were made, we headed back to his desk to discuss what we were looking for and it was agreed that the Elantra sounded like the right car for us.
There was some confusion on the vehicle color,  apparently Gray and Silver are very similar and we were definitely looking for a dark gray. We test drove a black Elantra, we got back to the dealership and started discussing features that we were looking for that the black one simply didn't have. There were several gray Elantra's on the lot and we found one with all of the features we were looking for 'and then some"
We discussed pricing, which was surprisingly straight forward. The only issue I had was with the offer for my trade and that was quickly corrected.
All in all I would recommend  Tameron Hyundai to anyone who is in the market for a new car with an EXCEPTIONAL 20 year 200,000 mile warranty.

name: EV Roosevelt
text: Bay doors opened at 7:30, my car was immediately taken in.  Comfortable waiting room, automobile was ready in appx 1 hour.  Service personnel explained what was done to my vehicle and when my next regular appt needed to me made.  Then he walked me to my car.

name: Tammy Kingston
text:
It has been a few years since we have bought a new vehicle, and this experience went so well, that is erased any past bad experiences we might have had.  First of all, in this time of Covid, I was a bit apprehensive about doing test drives or talking with a sales representative, but I was pleased to see that all sales staff wore masks at all times.  There were also hand sanitizer at every desk, and plexi glass partitions.  The extra precautions did not go unnoticed.

Although I had done my research on the 2021 Santa Fe, our sales representative Citron Choice went above and beyond anything I could have learned by watching a YouTube video.  He answered every question I had about the car, and pointed out the numerous features with enthusiasm.  I never once felt patronized, and we connected immediately, even though he had been working almost exclusively with my husband.

The buying process itself from start to finish, took two hours, but not a moment was wasted.  We left the dealership believing every staff member there cared that we were satisfied with our purchase.  This is a dealership I will recommend to anyone without reservation.

name: Leilani Jordan
text: Michael in Tameron Hyundai's Service Department...AWESOME. I had a lot of work done...but it was worth it. I was on a tight schedule but they did it and I was able to make it to my 4 o'clock doctor's appointment on time. I called the Hyundai company in my city and it would take 2 weeks before they could see me. I called Tameron Wednesday (1/27/21) evening at 4:30pm and they gave me a 1pm time slot for the next. I got there at 12:55pm and they were ready for me...I would hate to have to drive 80 miles just to be serviced...but I WILL...LOL! Thanks again Mike and Tameron Hyundai. BTW, they didn't even pressure me about purchasing a new vehicle...OMG that 2021 Hyundai Genesis I sat next to for a tap over 2 hrs (I said I had a lot of work done)....WHEW! I probably would have traded my 2018 Santa Fe in on the spot...naaaaaah I'm  good for now...LOL!

name: Wolfe's Workshop
text: Shady!!  Tried every unethical trick in the book, held us hostage with our trade in key. Low balled us by more than $4000, would only let us see one car. Tried to scam us with nitrogen in the tires and other addendum scams. Never buying a car from here.

name: Dale Sale
text:
My fiancé brought her car in for an oil leak today after having her oil changed November 24th 2020, she had made an appointment for a few weeks ago but we had some personal issues so she was not able to bring it in until today. Her service advisor, Brian informed her that the oil leak was coming from the o-ring for the drain plug due to it being cracked. Brian said this is considered a “wear and tear item” and that she should probably get her oil changed since she was due for another one in around another 1k miles.

This is where my issue begins, I call Brian to get more information and he is immediately defensive when I ask him for the information about what is going on. I asked him why the O ring isn’t just a parts warranty issue, they pull the plug, put a new seal in it, fill it back up with oil and quote a filter IF she wants to put one in since it is close, he mumbled and tried to get his thoughts together and said i may not understand how warranty works. I’ve been a technician for a different brand for 8 years we use the same computer systems as them and parts warranties generally don’t only last a month, regardless Brian was beyond unprofessional in our coversation and within our 20 minute conversation he tells me:

- o rings are a wear and tear item, which if it was replaced during the service, a month ago.. it shouldn’t be “worn”.
-She didn’t make an appoitment for two weeks prior(we have the paper work that says she did, that they printed out for her today) and so there is no way that his technician could have left it loose or over torqued the plug because it would have been noticed sooner than a month(it was).
- for all he knows I did this to attempt at getting a free oil change
- this may be something I (me) would do to a customer but they would never not take the blame if it was their fault.
- she should start checking her 2018 vehicle for oil leaks every morning just like he does so that next time there is a “faulty o-ring, that is also a wear and tear item” is noticed within a month.
- he doesn’t have to speak with me because the car isn’t in my name.
- there is ZERO management in the building including service manager/director and general manager for me to speak with other than him.
- and finally he said the oil change had all ready been performed all he did was have his technician do what was approved on the service recommendations which
Had zero approved items

Over all, the man was beyond unprofessional had a snarky attitude from the beginning and essentially tried to shift blame onto me instead of just making the situation right.

name: Cindy Hastings
text: Great service and very friendly, but I sat there for TWO hours.  That wasn’t so great, but they did apologize.

name: Christina allen

From the day Joe Bajalia took over the repair, the service was excellent. Brian Harbison oversaw the details of the repair, worked with the extended warranty and kept me informed throughout the process. Brian explained the needed repairs and answered all my questions without being condescending. I have always been pleased with the service department at Tameron, but never thought much about it until this major issue. I will be a loyal customer from now on! Excellent, professional service!

The "internet" price then goes up almost 3K on a 15K car. Their reason is because I'm going to pay cash. So - as far as I could tell neither the cars were real nor the price..

name: Bettye Lewis
text: The People there was professional and provided great service in a timely manner!  The waiting area was clean  and comfortable. Everyone was very nice.

name: J. Ellen Whiting
text: I bought my 2014 Hyundai Tucson at Tameron Hyundai in October 2015. It has been the absolute best car (SUV) I’ve ever owned. Other than general maintenance, I’ve never had an issue until the car completely died on me! I made a call to Tameron and spoke with Matt Austin in the service department... let me just say he was amazing from the start! I told him what happened and asked if I could have my car towed to the shop. Long story short, my engine had a campaign in effect regarding the software and potential problems that may result from that campaign. And what do you know, due to the result of the malfunction ... my engine had to be replaced. Matt was amazing keeping me updated with the process and even put me in a loaner car until my car was up and running again. I cannot rave enough about the communication and thorough explanation about my car and what repairs other than the engine component that may need replacing. From the courteous staff to the feeling of being prioritized... I cannot thank Tameron Hyundai Service Department and especially Matt Austin enough for your amazing service!!!!

name: Emily
text: Is every Hyundai dealership full of jerky people with attitudes? We brought our sante fe in to get the recalls fixed on it. We weren’t given a timeframe beyond perhaps a couple days even if parts needed to be ordered. The man in service department named Brian was rather rude to my husband on the phone after he asked for rental car to cover us through the time we were without our only vehicle with AC in it. I recently discovered I was pregnant and this has been unnecessary stress on me. We weren’t going to called Monday and told the parts didn’t come in. We were livid to find out we weren’t to be told and were informed it would take till Wednesday or Thursday for it to be done. Even then we were refused a rental and told the certain recalls didn’t cover a rental. At which point my mother called to see what the deal was. She spoke to Brian. He was rather snarky and unapologetic when speaking to her and informed her that the recalls have been out for eight years. We’ve only owned this vehicle for five years and were unaware of said recalls. Once my mother got off the phone with him he immediately called us to say our car was fixed on Tuesday which by that point we were unable to pick it up that day because of work schedules.  I will never be using this dealership again. My first and last visit.

name: Katie Seals
text:
My husband and I have both purchased our vehicles from Tameron. He purchased his used. I purchased a new 2016 Tuscan. We faithfully bring our cars to Tameron for every service, or did until now.

Ever since my first year owning the Tuscan, I gave experienced it shaking. I have brought it in numerous times over the years because it progressively got worse. Over the past two years, it has gotten horrible- and I have been vocal to the service department. I’ve been told it’s just the car- it’s the double clutch.
Today I decided to get a second opinion, and I need A NEW TRANSMISSION and a new battery. I knew it wasn’t normal, but was ignored numerous times.

We will no longer be using Tameron services or purchasing vehicles from Tameron.

He is, without question,  the best salesman I have ever worked with.  I must also mention Christina who walked me through finance in 19 minutes flat.  I was almost in shock as Mark handed me my keys and I was on my way because the entire process had been so smooth and expedient.  I didn't have to wait in the dealership for hours or go back and forth settling on a purchase price.

Thank you to the Tameron Hyundai management for hiring the best!  I am a very satisfied customer who will be back and will definitely be letting my friends and family know where to buy their next vehicle.

I especially love my spacious Sonata which has a lot of get up and go which is what I need as I'm a woman on the go. This car hasn't given me any problems beyond regular wear and tear and when I hit 600K miles, I'm looking forward to getting another one!

text: carried my car here to have a issue with the transmission seen about. The car would go into reverse but would hesitate going into drive it would eventually pop and go. The car is now worse than it was its completely undrivable. The problem was not fixed at all. Tameron hyundai responded and offered to repair 65% of the cost for a new transmission as the transmission was faulty when put in the car. They gave us a brand new loaner for two weeks while the work was being done on our car. Our car now runs smoothly no issues. Thank you!

The work was very quick, and because my situation with minor, they ended up not even charging me. (Oh, and I just remembered that in the brief time I was standing and waiting for my car to be attended/finished, a different staff member asked if I was being helped- the unobtrusive attentiveness was refreshing!)

name: Amy
text: Love the service and the people who work there! Everyone is so nice and they get you in and out very fast

name: Angela Whitaker
text:
********10/11/19 Update, now the same vehicle that this dealership was comfortable with selling to me for more than $7900 just 2 days ago is now on their website for $3994. Choose wisely consumers********

Found a vehicle at this dealership on Cargurus for $4994, checked the dealership website before making the trip, car listed there for the same price with a red line marked through it saying "don't pay list price". Arrived to the dealership, took a test drive, checked the dealership website while on the test drive, same price  of $4994 with the red line marked through it.  Sat in the dealership waiting to get a price to pay cash, waited almost as long as I would have if I were financing it for the young man to come back with an "out the door price" of $7900. Sir what happened to the price of $4994 that is on your website????  Now would you look at this, the car is no longer on the website yet it was there 30 minutes ago on the test drive. Is that why I sat there so long? So that you could remove the vehicle from the website and come back with an inflated bs price. Sounds like shady business to me. I WILL NEVER patronize Tameron Hyundai but who there cares, no one. It was only a $5000.00 sale anyway. But you DEFINITELY get 5 stars for being unprofessional, unethical and full of it! I gave the dealership one star to be able to write the review.

resp.text: Angela, we more than understand your frustration and we have reached out to you multiple times to apologize for the complete error in communication on our part. In short, one of our team members messed up. We wouldn't be able to function or stay in business if we posted the wrong prices online- we know car buyers are smart, informed, and probably shopping other lots while sitting in our dealership. The car was for sale at $4994, and we have now lowered that price to $3994. Again, we're incredibly sorry for the mishap, we hope we can turn this around and give you the car buying experience you deserve.

name: Cobb Saunders
text: Have purchased 3 cars from here, 1 new, 2 used. New was an excellent experience.  Used not so good x2.  Don't trust the used cars, they are questionable at best. One smoked within 3 days and they refused to do anything.  The other was once a rental car and has had minor issues since I purchased it. Not a solid car like my 2013 Elantra.  2017 not near as good.

resp.text: Cobb, thanks for reaching out to us. We’re sorry to read about your used car experience— with every vehicle purchase we offer both new and used car warranties that can help protect you financially against maintenance issues. Vehicles bought ‘As-Is’ are exempt, which allows us to offer them at even lower prices. If you did have any problems we would be more than happy to fix it, and ensure your vehicle was safe and repaired. Please reach out to our Service Department and we would be more than happy to look at your vehicles!

Not a solid car like my 2013 Elantra.  2017 not near as good.

resp.text: Cobb, thanks for reaching out to us. We’re sorry to read about your used car experience— with every vehicle purchase we offer both new and used car warranties that can help protect you financially against maintenance issues. Vehicles bought ‘As-Is’ are exempt, which allows us to offer them at even lower prices. If you did have any problems we would be more than happy to fix it, and ensure your vehicle was safe and repaired. Please reach out to our Service Department and we would be more than happy to look at your vehicles!

name: Angela Whitaker
text:
********10/11/19 Update, now the same vehicle that this dealership was comfortable with selling to me for more than $7900 just 2 days ago is now on their website for $3994. Choose wisely consumers********

Found a vehicle at this dealership on Cargurus for $4994, checked the dealership website before making the trip, car listed there for the same price with a red line marked through it saying "don't pay list price". Arrived to the dealership, took a test drive, checked the dealership website while on the test drive, same price  of $4994 with the red line marked through it.  Sat in the dealership waiting to get a price to pay cash, waited almost as long as I would have if I were financing it for the young man to come back with an "out the door price" of $7900. Sir what happened to the price of $4994 that is on your website????  Now would you look at this, the car is no longer on the website yet it was there 30 minutes ago on the test drive. Is that why I sat there so long? So that you could remove the vehicle from the website and come back with an inflated bs price. Sounds like shady business to me. I WILL NEVER patronize Tameron Hyundai but who there cares, no one. It was only a $5000.00 sale anyway. But you DEFINITELY get 5 stars for being unprofessional, unethical and full of it! I gave the dealership one star to be able to write the review.

resp.text: Angela, we more than understand your frustration and we have reached out to you multiple times to apologize for the complete error in communication on our part. In short, one of our team members messed up. We wouldn't be able to function or stay in business if we posted the wrong prices online- we know car buyers are smart, informed, and probably shopping other lots while sitting in our dealership. The car was for sale at $4994, and we have now lowered that price to $3994. Again, we're incredibly sorry for the mishap, we hope we can turn this around and give you the car buying experience you deserve.

name: Cecilia Comer
text: My time at Tameron was good Tues. They got my car in for oil change when I got there. I was in and out hour fifteen minutes.!!!! Good job!!!!

name: smooth man
text: great customer service

name: Stephen Edwards
text: The oil leak issue on my 2017 Santa Fe was taken care of in a very professional and courteous manner, with the least inconvenience to me. Very pleased with the service at Tameron Hyundai Hoover.

name: Clare W
text: I absolutely love the customer service.

name: Adam Fox
text: Excellent, fast, and they made it very easy.

resp.text: That’s our priority—thank you for seeing us!

name: Joshua Lynum
text: They were very nice and serviced my vehicle in an great amount of time.

name: Darrell Garrett
text: We went to Tameron with our youngest son, who is a Marine. He was on leave and needed to purchase his first car to drive back to his duty station in Virginia. He had very little time and a low budget. Adam was great in spending time with him and showing all the options he had in his price range. When nothing on the lot seem to grab his attention. Adam showed him a Tuscon that had just been traded in and was awaiting service and safety check. He loved it. Tameron made the vehicle a priority in getting it serviced and detailed for him. After we left, we found a small alignment problem on the rear wheel, they had it on the rack the following morning and made the repair. Never was he pressured into a car out of his budget, as a matter of fact they found a way to save our Marine a couple hundred dollars off the "non-negotiable" price. Our Marine is back serving his country in Virginia. He sent us a picture yesterday of himself in his Tuscon fishing on weekend liberty while Navy fighter jets practiced over his head! Thank you Tameron for making our son's needs a priority.

name: Kasey Pavelitz
text: Had a great experience getting my car serviced here! Needed my oil changed, tires rotated, and the 7500 mile checkup. The service guy was upfront about the cost and I knew exactly what was being done to my car. The waiting area was busy but I was able to get a seat, and  there was coffee and water although I was in and out in less than an hour! Just a note though it is a very good idea to make an appointment online or by calling them!! Made me plan pretty far in advance but that is way better than being at the car place all day!

name: David Sears
text: Very helpful in getting my car issues fixed. No Hassle over the warranty or trying to sell me anything extra! Highly Recommended!

name: Angela Schmeckebier

name: Kurt DeAngelis

text: I was very satisfied with the service department.  The service attendant fully explained what was being performed on my car and the work was completed in a timely manner.

resp.text: Whew! As much as we love seeing our customers, we totally get you don’t want to be at the dealership longer than necessary! You’ve got things to do and places to be!

name: James Erwin
text: We always enjoy taking in our Sonata for service!  The folks at Tameron Hyundai are all very friendly and the service is always great! We highly recommend Tameron Hyundai for sales and fast, professional service! We do love our Sonata!

text: Brandon over at Tameron Hyundai has been amazing with great customer service and communicating anything that was wrong and took great care of me. Definitely take your Hyundai over to Brandon at Tameron Hyundai. This location takes great care of their customers.

text: I have had only the best experience at this dealership.
